metadata.title: CVE-2024-26771 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: ti: edma: Add some null pointer checks to the edma_probedevm_kasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memorywhich can be NULL upon failure. Ensure the allocation was successfulby checking the pointer validity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
